languages.text:
"Знайте же, братья мои, что не будет покоя
В сердце моем, пока вас не увижу в Кьялхалле.
Слышу я смех ваш и ратные гордые кличи,
Их понесу я во тьму, последний Зловещего воя.
Многих врагов поражу, прославляя ваш подвиг,
Многих я смерти предам, чтобы чтить вашу память.
Когда же я наземь паду, смертельно сраженный,
Встретите вы Одинокого волка в Кьялхалле".

"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

"Знайте же, братья мои, что не будет покоя

Слышу я смех ваш и ратные гордые кличи,

Многих врагов поражу, прославляя ваш подвиг,

languages.text:
「『兄弟よ、知れ
ヴァルハラでお前たちに会うまでは
俺の心に安らぎはない。
お前たちの笑い声や
誇り高き戦いの雄叫びが聞こえる
俺は破滅の咆哮のために
闇の中にそれらを届けよう。
お前たちの行いを称えるために
多くの敵を打ち砕こう
お前たちの記憶を称えるために
多くに死を与えよう。
俺が地に伏し時
致命傷を負うときは
お前たちはヴァルハラで
一匹狼に会うだろう』」
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

”兄弟よ、知れ
ヴァルハラでお前たちに会うまでは
俺の心に安らぎはない。
お前たちの笑い声や
誇り高き戦いの雄叫びが聞こえる
俺は破滅の咆哮のために
闇の中にそれらを届けよう。
お前たちの行いを称えるために
多くの敵を打ち砕こう
お前たちの記憶を称えるために
多くに死を与えよう。
俺が地に伏し時
致命傷を負うときは
お前たちはヴァルハラで
一匹狼に会うだろう”

languages.text:
“‘我的兄弟们，请听我说，
在我与你们重逢于卡尔哈拉之前，
我的心将永远无法得到安宁。
我听到你们爽朗的大笑，
听到你们骄傲的战嗥，
我将以怒嚎者的名义
带领你们步入黑暗。
我将奋勇杀敌，
以煊赫你们的功绩，
我要献祭无数灵魂，
来纪念你们的回忆。
直到我颓然倒地，
重伤不起，
你们将在卡尔哈拉与
这匹独行的孤狼重逢。’”
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

traits.locale_text:
“我的兄弟们，请听我说，
在我与你们重逢于卡尔哈拉之前，
我的心将永远无法得到安宁。
我听到你们爽朗的大笑，
听到你们骄傲的战嗥，
我将以渴名者的名义
带领你们步入黑暗。
我将奋勇杀敌，
以煊赫你们的功绩，
我要献祭无数灵魂，
来纪念你们的回忆。
直到我颓然倒地，
重伤不起，
你们将在卡尔哈拉与
这匹独行的孤狼重逢。”

在我与你们重逢于卡尔哈拉之前，

直到我颓然倒地，
重伤不起，
你们将在卡尔哈拉与
这匹独行的孤狼重逢。”

languages.text:
« Sachez, vous mes frères,
que mon cœur ne connaîtra nulle paix
jusqu'à nos retrouvailles à Kjalhalla.
J'entends encore vos rires
et vos fiers cris de guerre ;
ils m'accompagneront dans les ténèbres,
en souvenir des Hurleurs sanguinaires.
Nombre d'ennemis je châtierai
pour glorifier vos exploits.
Nombre d'entre eux périront
pour honorer votre souvenir.
Lorsqu'au sol je tomberai,
mortellement blessé,
le loup solitaire à son tour
à Kjalhalla vous rejoindra. »
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

languages.text:
«"Sabed, hermanos míos,
que mi corazón no estará tranquilo
hasta nuestro reencuentro en el Kjalhalla.
Oigo vuestras risas
y vuestros orgullosos gritos,
y los llevaré conmigo a las tinieblas
por el Aullido Torvo.
Incontables enemigos aplastaré
para dar gloria a vuestro legado,
a muchos mataré
para honrar vuestro recuerdo.
Cuando caiga al suelo,
herido de muerte,
veréis de nuevo al Lobo Solitario
en los salones del Kjalhalla"».
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

traits.locale_text:
"Sabed, hermanos míos,
que mi corazón no estará tranquilo
hasta nuestro reencuentro en el Kjalhalla.
Oigo vuestras risas
y vuestros orgullosos gritos,
y los llevaré conmigo a las tinieblas
por los Hambrientos de Fama.
Incontables enemigos aplastaré
para dar gloria a vuestro legado,
a muchos mataré
para honrar vuestro recuerdo.
Cuando caiga al suelo,
herido de muerte,
veréis de nuevo al Lobo Solitario
en los salones del Kjalhalla".

languages.text:
"'Wisset, meine Brüder,
dass mein Herz keinen Frieden kennen wird,
bis ich Euch in Kjalhalla sehe.
Ich höre Euer Lachen
und Eure stolzen Kriegsschreie,
ich werde sie in die Dunkelheit tragen,
für die Baleful Howl.
Viele Feinde werde ich niederstrecken,
um Eure Taten zu verherrlichen,
viele werde ich töten,
um Euer Andenken zu ehren.
Wenn ich zu Boden falle,
tödlich verwundet,
werdet Ihr dem Einsamen Wolf begegnen,
in Kjalhalla.'"
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter

mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

languages.text:
'Şunu bilin ki kardeşlerim,
Sizleri Kjalhalla'da görene dek
Kalbim huzur bulmayacak.
Kahkahalarınızı ve gururlu
Savaş naralarınızı duyuyorum.
Uğursuz Uluma adına
Onları Karanlığa taşıyacağım.
Yaptıklarınıza şan katmak için
Sayısız düşmanı lanetleyeceğim.
Hatıranızı onurlandırmak için
Sayısız düşmanı öldüreceğim.
Ölümcül bir yara alıp
Yere yığıldığımda,
Görüşeceksiniz Yalnız Kurt ile
Kjalhalla'da.'
languages.original_text:
"'Know, my brothers,
that my heart will have no peace
until I see you in Kjalhalla.
I hear your laughter
and your proud war cries,
I will carry them into the darkness,
for the Baleful Howl.
Many foes I will smite
to glorify your deed,
Many I will put to death
to honour your memory.
When to the ground I fall,
mortally wounded,
You will meet the Lone Wolf
in Kjalhalla.'"

traits.locale_text:
'Şunu bilin ki kardeşlerim,
sizleri Kjalhalla'da görene dek
kalbim huzur bulmayacak.
Kahkahalarınızı
ve gururlu savaş naralarınızı duyuyorum.
Onları taşıyacağım karanlığa,
Uğursuz Uluma adına.
Yaptıklarınıza şan katmak için
lanetleyeceğim sayısız düşmanı.
Hatıranızı onurlandırmak için
öldüreceğim sayısız düşmanı.
Bedenim yere düştüğünde
ölümcül bir yarayla,
görüşeceksiniz Yalnız Kurt ile
Kjalhalla'da.'
